      • getJWT

        Parse the "jwt" attribute from given request.
        Parameters:
        request - servlet request
        Returns:
        decoded JWT
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the "jwt" attribute is missing or does not contain a decoded JWT
